summary: This document is a property record search certification for the premises located at 9 East 71st Street, New York, New York. It details the ownership history, including a deed involving Jeffrey E. Epstein, and outlines various legal and financial obligations associated with the property, including potential unpaid taxes and a lis pendens filed in 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is mentioned as the President of Nine East 71st Street Corporation in a deed recorded in 2011.

events.title: Deed Transfer
events.description: A deed was recorded transferring ownership from Nine East 71st Street Corporation, with Jeffrey E. Epstein as President, to Maple, Inc.

events.title: Lis Pendens Filed
events.description: A lis pendens was filed against the property, indicating a legal claim or pending litigation.

locations: 9 East 71st Street, New York, New York
keyFacts: The property at 9 East 71st Street is associated with Jeffrey E. Epstein as the President of Nine East 71st Street Corporation.
A lis pendens was filed on July 11, 2019, indicating ongoing legal issues related to the property.
The document outlines potential unpaid New York State and City corporate taxes against Maple, Inc. and Nine East 71st Street Corporation.
